course.subject: SEC
course.title: Advanced Research
course.catalogDescription: In this course, students will develop their master thesis proposal, which presents preliminary results of testing their hypotheses that they have formulated for tackling their research problems. This course can only be taken once for credits.

objectives.objective: To lay the groundwork of master theses
To premeditate a master-thesis research plan
To conduct a literature survey and identify a research problem
To formulate a hypothesis for tackling a research problem
To prototype a solution by going through devising research questions, drafting a design, and implmenting the design into a prototype
To conduct preliminary evaluation on the prototype
To premeditate a plan for SEC699 to complete the master thesis

outline.topic: Identifying a feasible research problem for a master thesis
Prototyping a solution Devising research questions Designing a solution Implementating a design
